__e: I wish I could remember what it was the Khan said that upset Marco so much.
Khan said to watch him very closely.
I'm also aware that I am not going to do precisely what Mohammed Khan has planned that I should do.
I was trailing Khan when I lost him on the corner of Second and Houston.
All the Khan's horses and all the Khan's men.
Well, he wants the secret about the tomb of Genghis Khan, and, naturally, he turned to your father.
He said Shere Khan is far away... but I had better take care and hide when he comes back here.
